channel.title: How to make players not able to yell 667
channel.description: how do i make it where donators and staff can only yell and players can not?

item.title: How to make players not able to yell 667
item.dc:creator: @theowned theowned
item.description:
@theowned wrote:

[quote=“ozarka cody, post:3, topic:464856”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=569006.msg4129084#msg4129084 date=1350840696]

if (command.equals("yell")) {
    if (player.isInGroup("Donator") || player.isInGroup("Staff")) {
        // do normal yell stuff here
    }
    // if they're not in the donator group, and they're not in the staff group, nothing will happen
}

put that in commands? or where do i put it?

Pseudo-code, but it conveys the steps necessary.
[/quote][/quote]

search for the command yell in your command.java
delete the if statement it ends with }
like the one zyle1992 send you delete that statement and replace it with the one that zyle send you compile and run your server it should be done

Read full topic
item.source: How to make players not able to yell 667

item.title: How to make players not able to yell 667

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

if (command.equals("yell")) {
    if (player.isInGroup("Donator") || player.isInGroup("Staff")) {
        // do normal yell stuff here
    }
    // if they're not in the donator group, and they're not in the staff group, nothing will happen
}

Pseudo-code, but it conveys the steps necessary.
